sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• In this game the switch user can create a playlist of songs. The playlist could be made for a party, golden time or to listen to in the car!
• Record "next" on one switch and "Add to the list" on the other
• Use a music streaming service to create a playlist that can be saved
• Begin to play a song or say an artists name
• If the switch user hits their switch that says "next" skip to the next song or say another artists name
• If the switch user hits their switch that says "add it to the list" add the song or add a song by the artisit named to the playlist
